dialogue.line: Father - Hello son, how can I help you again?
Clyde - I'm here to see if you already decided to help me!
Father - Not yet, it's a delicate matter...

option.text: 1) Come on Father, alone I can't figure out what to do...

dialogue.line: Father - I'm aware, son, and I've been thinking on how to help you...

option.text: 2) We can BEAT HIM!!! You know that, Father.

dialogue.line: Father - What job? Can you explain yourself?
Clyde - We need to KILL Abbadon Father! We need God's STRENGHT!
Father - Not that Abaddon story again...
Clyde - It's almost time!! I'll leave you now, but I hope you can help me!
Father - I'll do my best son... May God be with you!
